remarks:
Distribution of existential quantifiers in a quadruple conjunction. (Contributed by NM, 9-Mar-1995.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 20-Jan-2018.) 

---

 Distribution of existential quantifiers.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Mar-1995.)
statement:
4exdistr $p |- ( E. x E. y E. z E. w ( ( ph /\ ps ) /\ ( ch /\ th ) ) <-> E. x ( ph /\ E. y ( ps /\ E. z ( ch /\ E. w th ) ) ) ) $.
$d ch w $.
$d ph w $.
$d ph y $.
$d ph z $.
$d ps w $.
$d ps z $.
